pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multivariate Peaks-over-Threshold Modelling for Spatial Extreme Events // Tools for high-dimensional peaks-over-threshold inference and simulation of Brown-Resnick and extremal Student spatial extremal processes. These include optimization routines based on censored likelihood and gradient scoring, and exact simulation algorithms for max-stable and multivariate Pareto distributions based on rejection sampling. Fast multivariate Gaussian and Student distribution functions using separation- of-variable algorithm with quasi Monte Carlo integration are also provided. Key references include de Fondeville and Davison (2018) doi:10.1093/biomet/asy026, Thibaud and Opitz (2015) doi:10.1093/biomet/asv045, Wadsworth and Tawn (2014) doi:10.1093/biomet/ast042 and Genz and Bretz (2009) doi:10.1007/978-3-642-01689-9.
